titles.title: Providing for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.
Providing for the expenses of certain committees of the House of Representatives in the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on House Administration. H. Rept. 119-17.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 9.

action.text: Mr. Steil asked unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution, as amended Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

committee.name: House Committee on House Administration
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
